answer.content:
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Prim's Algorithm Visualization</title>
    <style>
        body {
            font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: center;
        }
        canvas {
            border: 1px solid black;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
        }
        button {
            padding: 10px 20px;
            font-size: 16px;
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>

<canvas id="graphCanvas" width="600" height="400"></canvas>
<button id="startButton">Start Prim's Algorithm</button>

<script>
    const canvas = document.getElementById('graphCanvas');
    const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');

    const vertices = [
        { x: 100, y: 100, id: 0 },
        { x: 300, y: 100, id: 1 },
        { x: 200, y: 250, id: 2 },
        { x: 400, y: 300, id: 3 },
        { x: 500, y: 150, id: 4 }
    ];

    const edges = [
        { from: 0, to: 1, weight: 10 },
        { from: 0, to: 2, weight: 15 },
        { from: 1, to: 2, weight: 35 },
        { from: 1, to: 3, weight: 20 },
        { from: 2, to: 3, weight: 25 },
        { from: 2, to: 4, weight: 30 },
        { from: 3, to: 4, weight: 5 },
    ];

    function drawGraph() {
        ctx.clearRect(0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height);
        
        // Draw edges
        edges.forEach(edge => {
            const start = vertices[edge.from];
            const end = vertices[edge.to];
            ctx.beginPath();
            ctx.moveTo(start.x, start.y);
            ctx.lineTo(end.x, end.y);
            ctx.strokeStyle = '#ccc';
            ctx.stroke();
            ctx.closePath();
        });

        // Draw vertices
        vertices.forEach(vertex => {
            ctx.beginPath();
            ctx.arc(vertex.x, vertex.y, 20, 0, Math.PI * 2);
            ctx.fillStyle = 'blue';
            ctx.fill();
            ctx.strokeStyle = 'black';
            ctx.stroke();
            ctx.closePath();
            ctx.fillStyle = 'white';
            ctx.fillText(vertex.id, vertex.x - 5, vertex.y + 5);
        });
    }

    function primsAlgorithm() {
        let visited = Array(vertices.length).fill(false);
        let resultEdges = [];
        visited[0] = true; // Start from the first vertex
        
        for (let i = 0; i < vertices.length - 1; i++) {
            let minEdge = { weight: Infinity };
            let fromVertex = -1;
            let toVertex = -1;

            edges.forEach(edge => {
                if (visited[edge.from] && !visited[edge.to] && edge.weight < minEdge.weight) {
                    minEdge = edge;
                    fromVertex = edge.from;
                    toVertex = edge.to;
                } else if (visited[edge.to] && !visited[edge.from] && edge.weight < minEdge.weight) {
                    minEdge = edge;
                    fromVertex = edge.to;
                    toVertex = edge.from;
                }
            });

            if (fromVertex !== -1 && toVertex !== -1) {
                visited[toVertex] = true;
                resultEdges.push(minEdge);
                drawGraphWithResult(resultEdges);
            }
        }
    }

    function drawGraphWithResult(selectedEdges) {
        drawGraph();
        
        // Highlight selected edges
        selectedEdges.forEach(edge => {
            const start = vertices[edge.from];
            const end = vertices[edge.to];
            ctx.beginPath();
            ctx.moveTo(start.x, start.y);
            ctx.lineTo(end.x, end.y);
            ctx.strokeStyle = 'red';
            ctx.lineWidth = 4;
            ctx.stroke();
            ctx.closePath();
        });
    }

    document.getElementById('startButton').addEventListener('click', () => {
        primsAlgorithm();
    });

    drawGraph(); // Initial drawing
</script>

</body>
</html>

messages.content: Generate a single HTML file with JavaScript demonstrating the user-given concept. Only respond in a single HTML file.
